events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago but it still hasn't arrived. The tracking info hasn't updated in several days and I'm getting worried about the delay.
The issue was categorized as Delivery Delay due to customer mentioning delay, tracking not updating, and late arrival of the order.
The case was assigned to Agent Sarah who specializes in shipping and delivery issues.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand your order is delayed and Iâ€™m here to help you track it down and resolve the issue.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking details you have so I can look into the current status?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and the tracking number is ZX987654321. The tracking hasn't updated since it shipped over a week ago.
I've contacted the shipping carrier to investigate the delay. In the meantime, I can offer free expedited shipping on your next order and will update you within 24 hours.
Thank you for looking into this and for the offer. I appreciate the quick response and hope the carrier finds my package soon.
The carrier confirmed your package was delivered yesterday. Please check the delivery location. Let us know if you still cannot locate it.
Just following up to ensure that you received your package and everything is in order. Please reach out if you need any further assistance.
Since there have been no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support, and have a great day!
